article_title: Lacrosse coach, former football coach injured in Wilmington hit and run
article_text:
WILMINGTON, NC (WWAY) — The N.C. Highway Patrol is investigating a hit-and-run accident that left four people injured early Saturday including the former New Hanover head football coach and current head Lacrosse coach.

Sergeant P.M. Sanders said the four people were walking on Marsh Oaks Drive shortly before 2 a.m. Saturday when it happened.
